Summary: Electrically lit, moving fast earthwards possible.
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around July 30th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsIt definitely was technological in nature (i.e electric lights or something thatlooked like them). A bright white light, and a dimmer red one to the side. Itseemed to be on a descending pathmaybe a 15 degree angle from the earths surface. It was low on the horizon,perhaps it went right into Lake Ontario, or perhaps it was further south. Itwas moving very fast, and only appeared for about a quarter of a second, but Ilooked right at it.
